data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Pam and Jim have two babies. They ____ like a very ____ family. But ____ do ____ know ____ many ____ they ____ have. Pam ____ like ____ have ____ children. Jim ____ seven ____ eight! They will need a bigger house.
data.partBlankContent: Pam and Jim have two babies. They wo___ like a very b__ family. But th__ do n__ know h__ many chil____ they c__ have. Pam wo___ like t_ have fi__ children. Jim wa___ seven o_ eight! They will need a bigger house.
data.fullContent: Pam and Jim have two babies. They would like a very big family. But they do not know how many children they can have. Pam would like to have five children. Jim wants seven or eight! They will need a bigger house.
data.answer: 帕姆和吉姆有两个孩子。他们想要一个大家庭。但是他们不知道他们能有多少孩子。潘想要五个孩子。吉姆想要七八个！他们需要一个更大的房子。
